'''Face the Truth''' is the tenth track of [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]].

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">The moon, the sign of hope
It appeared when we left the pain of the ice-desert behind
We faced up to the curse and endured misery
Condemned we are
We brought hope, but also lies, and treachery
</poem>
[[Category:Songs by Blind Guardian]]
